org.franca.core.utils

Class FrancaRecursiveValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.franca.core.utils.AbstractFrancaValidator
      • org.franca.core.utils.FrancaRecursiveValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFrancaValidator

    public class FrancaRecursiveValidator
extends AbstractFrancaValidator
    Uses Xtext validators of Franca IDL to validate a Franca resource (*.fidl). It will validate imported files recursively.
    Author:
    Klaus Birken (itemis)
